text: wqal almstdefwn lrwsayhm fi aldlal: bal tdbyrkm alsharu lana fi allayl walnahar hu aldhy awqena fi althlkt, fakuntum ttlbwn minaa 'an nakfur ballh, wanajeal lah shuraka' fi alebadt, wasrr kull min alfariqayn alhasrat hin ra'awua aleadhab aldhy 'uedd lhm, wajaealna al'aghlal fi 'aenaq aladhin kfru, la yeaqabwn bhdha aleiqab 'iilaa bsbb kufruhum biallah waeamalihim alsayiyaat fi aldnya. wafi alayat tahdhir shadid min mutabaeat dueat aldalal waymt altghyan
